description:
Cloud-based cross-platform mind mapping software

MindMaster, a cross-platform and versatile mind mapping software, is an effective solution to help you quickly become a competent mind mapping designer! It provides abundant intelligent layouts, various presentation modes, exquisite design elements and preset theme styles, making it a veritable productivity tool for users. Since its launch, it has been well received by users and is widely used in problem solving, time management, business strategy and project management.
